abstract: Opens the document at the specified file URL.

declaration.code: @MainActor func callAsFunction(at url: URL) async throws

overview:
## Discussion

Don’t call this method directly. SwiftUI calls it when you call the [doc://com.apple.SwiftUI/documentation/SwiftUI/EnvironmentValues/openDocument] action:

For information about how Swift uses the `callAsFunction()` method to simplify call site syntax, see [https://docs.swift.org/swift-book/ReferenceManual/Declarations.html#ID622] in *The Swift Programming Language*.
title: callAsFunction(at:)
